Package edu.ucla.sspace.similarity

Interface Summary
SimilarityFunction An Interface for any similarity metric between two Vectors.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSymmetricSimilarityFunction A base implementation for any symmetic SimilarityFunction that requires no parameters.
AverageCommonFeatureRank Computes the Average Common Feature Rank between two feature vectors.
CosineSimilarity Returns the cosine similarity between any two Vectors.
DotProduct Returns the dot product of the two vectors.
EuclideanSimilarity Returns the Euclidean Similarity between any two Vectors.
GaussianKernel Returns the Gaussing kernel weighting of two vectors using a parameter to weight the distance between the two vectors.
JaccardIndex Returns the Jaccard Index between any two Vectors.
KendallsTau A functional class for computing Kendall's tau of the values in the two vectors.
KLDivergence Returns the KL Divergence between any two probability distributions represented as Vectors.
LinSimilarity Returns the Lin Similarity between any two Vectors.
OneSimilarity Returns 1, always.
PearsonCorrelation Returns the Pearson Correlation between any two Vectors.
PolynomialKernel Returns the dot product of the two vectors raised to a specified power.
SpearmanRankCorrelation Returns the Spearman Rank Correlation between any two Vectors.
TanimotoCoefficient Returns the Tanimoto Coefficient between any two Vectors.
